creator: kdowney@amberarcher.com
text:
<javac> should probably have debug="true" so source line numbers are included in
stack traces.

creator: berin@ozemail.com.au
text:
Good point - it's been causing me problems as well.

Rather than turn it on by default, I have taken dims' patch which allows user
setting of properties and melded it with this request.

The javac invocations now set debug="${build.compile.debug}".  This is not set
by default, but you can add the line 

build.compile.debug=on 

to the file build.properties in the same directory as build.xml and it will turn
on debug info.
